item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 20 Jun 2023
item.description:
1. Packaging an executable for homebrew install for non-OCaml users
  2. v0.16 release of Jane Street packages
  3. New release of Menhir (20230608)
  4. Dream-html - DSL to build HTML, integrated with Dream
  5. release of minisat 0.5
  6. Which filters would you like to see on the OCaml blog at OCaml.org?
  7. OCaml Platform Newsletter, May 2023
  8. Congratulation to the OCaml team for the 2023 SIGPLAN programming languages software award! üèÜ
  9. Other OCaml News
